local_intent: Perceive the white_plate, move above and align, compute a pinch grasp (plate_grasp), execute Pick using plate_grasp, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: white_plate is within sensor/arm reach and can be detected
ComputeGraspPose can produce a valid plate_grasp key
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase exactly: perception → approach/align → compute grasp → Pick → verify IsGraspStable, matching the GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION and LOCAL_ANNOTATION.
